Description.Name: Mystery Box
Description.Details: Yang calls you to the MechLab, where you find him standing in the shadow of an enormous ferro-aluminum crate. "I don't think that the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBountyHunter],Bounty Hunter]] realized what he was giving us, Boss. What we've got is one third of a mothballed assault 'Mech—mostly the guts, so it doesn't look like much to the untrained eye. But what I can tell you is that this 'Mech is strange. Never seen anything quite like it." Farah raises her hand. "And I think I have a lead on the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDobrev],Dobrev]]. An old colleague of mine contacted me about a group of patients at the hospital she administrates. They were suffering from what appeared to be [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMisjump],misjump]]-induced injuries. I think it's worth investigating." Sumire rubs her temples. "I can't believe I'm saying this, but I've got one, too. A [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreJumpShip],JumpShip]] operator I used to hang with has been running his mouth about a big job he just did for Notker Baumann. Want me to follow up?"

Description.Name: Prioritize following up on Farah's lead.
high spirits, defend your decision, one-on-one
Description.Details: You nod at Farah. "Your lead sounds promising. Follow up on it. For the time being, this is your top priority." Later, Farah calls you into Engineering. You find her standing in front of a terminal, a huge smile on her face. "I did what you asked—you know, dug for information—and I've found it! The patients, all of whom had substantial criminal histories, shared a common point of origin: [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAppian],Appian]]. I've already told Sumire, and she's marked it on our star map." You nod. "Good work, Farah. Our hunt for the Dobrev is back on, thanks to you."

Description.Name: Prioritize following up on Sumire's lead.
high spirits, the fans approve
Description.Details: You nod at Sumire. "Okay, Meyer, your lead sounds promising. Follow up on it. For the time being, this is your top priority." Later, she calls you to the bridge. You find her standing by the viewscreen, a weary half smile on her face. "Found it. Long story, I'd rather not get into it—whiskey and cigars were involved. But the Dobrev is on [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAppian],Appian]]. I've marked it on the star map already. We can get going whenever you want. " You nod. "Good work, Sumire. Our hunt for the Dobrev is back on, thanks to you." She rolls her eyes. "Don't remind me."
